New Records: Croatia won their fourth consecutive home game with a clean sheet
Key Match Events: Luka Modric scored the winning goal from a free-kick
Duje Caleta-Car forced Lukasz Skorupski into an early save
Igor Matanović was off target with a hat-trick of chances
Nicola Zalewski almost netted again with Poland's first shot on target
Bruno Petković’s curling effort was tipped away by Skorupski
Pre-Game Insights: Croatia had strong home form, having lost just one of their last seven before tonight
Post-Match Reflections: Croatia held on for an important victory after losing their Nations League opener 2-1 to Portugal
Both teams now have three points from their first two matches, as they aim to qualify for the UNL play-offs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Croatia had a clean sheet, their fourth consecutive home game without conceding
This was the same scoreline as their last meeting in 2008
